definitions.title: n.f. scale
definitions.body: of fish, etc.;—of water-animals having ´[[סְנַפִּיר וְק]]: fin and scale De 14:9, De 14:10 = Le 11:9, Le 11:10, Le 11:12; pl. [[קַשְׂקַשִׂים]], of scale-armour 1Sa 17:5; pl. sf. [[קַשְׂקְשׂתֶיךָ]] Ez Eze 29:4, Eze 29:4 (of Pharaoh under fig. of crocodile).
